SEARCH
Package com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.service

Interface CardService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CardServiceImpl
public interface CardService
Service interface defining the contract for all card-related business operations.

This layer acts as an intermediary between the controller and the repository, encapsulating business logic such as validation, transformation, and calculations.

Author: Timothy Butler
Course: CEN 3024 - Software Development 1
Date: June 18, 2025

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      Optional<CardDTO> addCard(CardDTO cardDTO)
      Adds a new card to the system based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      cardDTO - the card data to add
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the created CardDTO, or empty if the card already exists

    • deleteCard

      boolean deleteCard(int cardId)
      Deletes a card by its card number.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the card number to delete
      Returns:
      true if the card was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getAllCards

      List<Card> getAllCards()
      Retrieves all cards from the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all stored Card entities

    • findByCardId

      Card findByCardId(int cardId)
      Retrieves a card by its card number.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the card number to find
      Returns:
      the corresponding Card if found

    • calculateCollectionStatistics

      Map<String,Object> calculateCollectionStatistics()
      Calculates statistics across the entire card collection.
      Returns:
      a map of statistical keys and their corresponding values

    • calculateCollectionValues

      Map<String,BigDecimal> calculateCollectionValues()
      Calculates both owner and market values for the card collection.
      Returns:
      a map with "owner" and "market" as keys and their respective values

    • addAllCardsFromFile

      List<Card> addAllCardsFromFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Imports multiple cards from a file and adds them to the system.
      Parameters:
      file - the uploaded text file containing card data
      Returns:
      a list of successfully imported Card entities

    • updateCard

      Optional<Card> updateCard(int cardNumber, CardDTO cardDTO)
      Updates an existing card using the given card number and updated DTO data.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - the card number of the card to update
      cardDTO - the updated card data
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the updated Card, or empty if not found
